sentences.sContent: You said something about the integration of the resistance movement into the galactic confederation.
sentences.sContent_eng: You said something about the integration of the resistance movement into the galactic confederation.
sentences.sCn: 你说过一些有关将抵抗运动整合进入银河联盟。

sentences.sContent: All three findings pointed to dynamic movement in galaxies and in monstrous galactic clusters, the largest stable structures in the universe.
sentences.sContent_eng: All three findings pointed to dynamic movement in galaxies and in monstrous galactic clusters, the largest stable structures in the universe.
sentences.sCn: 所有的三项发现都指出，在宇宙最大的稳定结构，即星系和巨大银河星团中有动态的运动。

sentences.sContent: These speedy electrons interact with photons in the galactic halo, boosting some of them up to the gamma-ray energies observed in the bubbles.
sentences.sContent_eng: These speedy electrons interact with photons in the galactic halo, boosting some of them up to the gamma-ray energies observed in the bubbles.
sentences.sCn: 这些高速电子与银河晕的光子相互作用，将它们中的一些激发，使之成为泡泡中观测到的伽马射线。

words.tran: 银河；[天] 星系；银河系；一群显赫的人
